short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test your knowledge with fun trivia questions!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "Triviana" â€“ the ultimate Chrome extension for a quick trivia fix! Test your knowledge and have fun with fascinating questions from various categories. Each new tab reveals a new brain-teaser that will keep you engaged and entertained. Simply click "Reveal" to uncover the answer and challenge your friends to beat your score. With "Triviana," every browsing session turns into an exciting round of trivia, making learning and discovery a delightful part of your day. Get ready to exercise your brain and have a blast with this user-friendly and captivating extension.
